content: The files will be permanently deleted in 30 days.

comment.text: This text informs the user about the permanent deletion timeline for files moved to the trash. It appears within a delete confirmation dialog, clarifying that files will be permanently removed after 30 days. Translators should ensure the timeframe is accurately conveyed in the target language.

usage.context: <> You are about to move files ({{ filesCount }}) to {{ trashSection: t("Common:TrashSection") }}.{" "} {" "} {!isThirdParty ? t("FilesDeletedAfter") : null}{" "} {t("Common:WantToContinue")} ); }
